casebody.data:
Kelly K. Suggs JACOBS and Persons Similarly Situated
v.
PHYSICIANS WEIGHT LOSS CENTER OF AMERICA, INC., Charles E. Sekeres, Cecile Holden, John D. Sideris, Paul C. Hunt, Jean Thomas, Cookie Parker, G.A. Parker, Healthy Weigh, Inc., P.C.H. Today, Inc., and Virginia Evelyn Doremus. No. 681P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Scott M. Stevenson, S. Frederick Winiker, Patricia Wilson Magee, Charlotte, for Physicians Weight Loss, et al. Frederick L. Berry, John F. Bloss, Greensboro, for Kelly Jacobs.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 8th day of December 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
